name: kshermit
short_description: kshermit is a Korn shell script that contains only ASCII characters in the range [0x20,0x7e] plus 0x0a, and implements the Kermit file transfer protocol well enough to receive a file. The purpose of this script is to bootstrap a system that doesn't have a file transfer program installed or enabled. The script can be transferred as an ASCII file (copy and paste it into a terminal). After that, you can upload any file you like, such as a proper implementation of Kermit.
summary: A Korn shell script that can receive a file using the Kermit protocol.
